sentences.finnish: Pedro ja Hanna muuttavat uuteen asuntoon Puistotielle.
sentences.english: Pedro and Hanna are moving to a new apartment on Puistotie.

sentences.finnish: Asunnossa 45 neliötä ja melko kallis vuokra.
sentences.english: The apartment is 45 square meters and the rent is quite expensive.
The Mäkelä family lives next door to them.
Pedro is carrying the chairs to the basement.
